articles.title: Madison Chock, Evan Bates say they thought they secured gold amid controversial ice dancing scores - Yahoo
articles.description: American skating couple Madison Chock and Evan Bates won the silver medal in ice dancing at the 2026 Winter Olympics. The French team narrowly won gold...
articles.content: American skating couple Madison Chock and Evan Bates won the silver medal in ice dancing at the 2026 Winter Olympics. The French team narrowly won gold despite visible mistakes. The couple told CBS N… [+138 chars]
